page.title: 05A SCHOOLDAY BY A 10 YEAR OLD
page.content: I USUALLY GET UP AT 7.00 O'CLOCK AND THEN HAVE MY BREAKFAST BEFORE TAKING MY DOG FOR A WALK. I THEN WATCH T.V.UNTIL 8.35 WHEN I LEAVE FOR SCHOOL. THE BELL GOES AT 9.00 A.M. IN CLASS WE USUALLY DO MATHS UNTIL PLAYTIME. WE OFTEN WORK IN GROUPS AND READ DIFFERENT BOOKS, WRITE, WORK WITH THE COMPUTER,DO OUR PROJECT STUDY. SOME OF MY FRIENDS GO HOME FOR THEIR LUNCH BUT I STAY AT SCHOOL.MY FAVOURITE LUNCH IS FISH AND CHIPS. SOME DAYS WE GET DIFFERENT TEACHERS WHO GIVE US MUSIC,P.E.,OR ART. WHEN I GO HOME I WATCH THE TELEVISION,HAVE MY TEA AND SUPPER AND GO T0 BED ABOUT 10.00 O'CLOCK.
